description: Workflow enforcement hooks for bug-fix plugin

hooks.prompt: Check if a /bug-fix workflow is active. If YES: 1) Identify the current phase (1-8) based on conversation progress. 2) List completed phases. 3) Note key decisions (selected fix approach, test strategy). 4) Write this state to claude-tmp/bug-fix-state.json using Write tool with format: {"active": true, "currentPhase": N, "completedPhases": [...], "decisions": {...}, "summary": "brief context"}. Return: {"decision": "allow"}. If NO active workflow, return: {"decision": "allow"}.
